description: Is not launching after installation. I would love to try it. Maybe someone can give an idea of how to sort the problem. Had installed it both ways, using the software installer and using the synaptic package manager. None of them worked.

Started from command line and then did as suggested... typed in 'Example('.
Seg fault.
Ran again and typed in 'Help(' and seg faulted.

Ubuntu 22.04.3, KDE Plasma desktop. Nothing happens when running fron the GUI desktop. Running "yacas" from the command line gives some sort of text shell that I haven't tried to learn yet. I was hoping for a GUI.

~$ yacas

In> ^C pressed
Quitting...
Läßt sich nicht starten, bringt nur eine undurchsichtige Fehlermeldung.
